name: SoftSide Adventure of the Month 09: Klondike Adventure
overview: Klondike Adventure is the ninth in a series of monthly text adventures for multiple systems. You have come to the Klondike in search of Yukon Bill's riches, but you must beware the bitter cold, and other dangers of the Arctic. Game is a treasure hunt, where the player must locate a gold nugget, gold flakes, a pickax, a fur coat, and the last will and testament of Yukon Bill. All these five items must be returned to the starting area for a perfect score of 100 points. During the adventure, the player will beat up a walrus, steal a dead man's boots, meet Santa Claus, steal Rudolph's nose, rob a vending machine, pan for cold, and crawl around inside an oil well. All commands are via 2-word VERB NOUN entries, and game play contains several object puzzles. There is a save and restore feature.
